name: passionately
content:

B2 in a way that shows that you have very strong feelings or emotions: Ann has always believed passionately in women's rights. I feel passionately that I did the right thing.
in a way that shows strong sexual feelings: I walked into the room and found them kissing passionately. The two fall immediately and passionately in love. See
passionate
More examplesFewer examplesCarl wanted passionately to be involved.She argued passionately against the proposal.Think of something you feel passionately about.The actor was spotted passionately kissing a blonde companion.
